name: Super Simple Shortcodes – Create your own Custom Shortcodes for Contact Info & More
author: Web Results Direct

sections.description:
Create your own custom shortcodes to add across your site, keeping your key information consistent across your site. Keep contact info and repeated content centralised to one place so you only ever need to update it once.

Make changes in one place

Keep your important contact information centralised into one place with custom shortcodes. You can create shortcodes for your email address, phone number, social media links and more and then if that information changes you’ll be able to updated the shortcode in only one place. Never find an old email address or phone number buried in your site again!

Create your own Repeated Content

If there are blocks of content you want to use multiple times across your website, you might find it difficult to update it in the future. With custom shortcodes, you can keep that content centralised to a single location and update it across your entire site from one place.

Lightweight & WordPress Friendly

Custom Shortcodes is built to be a lightweight addition to your site, so it won’t bog down your install. In fact, no additional scripts or assets are added to the front-end of your site. The plugin integrates with WordPress seamlessly and doesn’t try to fight it.

FAQs

Where do I find my Custom Shortcodes?
To view your custom shortcodes and create new ones, go to Tools > Custom Shortcodes.
